cause.description:
This cause is dedicated to the Turkish inhabitants of Northern Cyprus who voted for the UN sponsored Annan peace settlement in 2004, but was rejected by the Internationally known country Republic of Cyprus (or South Cyprus also known as Greek Cyprus).
Three years ago the UN and EU promised to end isolation of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus if it supported the Annan peace settlement - that was 3 years ago and the status of the TRNC has not changed since 2004.
1. TRNC to be internationally recognized
2. End the economic embargo against the TRNC
cause.mission: End the economic embargo and establish International recognition for the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus
cause.name: International recognition for the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus
